questions.question:
Which of the following X values will yield the below expression to ‘True’?
(X < (X + 1)) && (X == 8)
Which of the following are correct variable names?
Which of the following comments is used to add a Block-Line comment in Java?

Consider the following code segment and evaluate the two statements below:
String result =
(number > 0) ?
 ((number % 2 == 0) ? "Positive Odd" : "Positive Even") :
 ((number < 0) ? "Negative" : "Zero");
System.out.print(result);
Statement A – If the number variable is 13 the above code prints: Positive Odd
Statement B – If the number variable is 0 the above code prints: Zero
options: Both A and B are true
Both A and B are false
A is true, but B is false
A is false, but B is true
questions.answer: A is false, but B is true
